nodes.text: Star Wars Drawing Studio is an interactive art kit that provides step-by-step instructions to drawing Star Wars characters Yoda, C-3PO, R2-D2, Darth Vader, Princess Leia, Luke Skywalker, BB-8, Kylo Ren, and Rey. The kit includes the Star Wars Project Book, with artwork and instructional text by Lucasfilm collaborator and professional artist Russell Walks. It was published by Walter Foster Publishing on September 21, 2018.
